summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2135 for the improvement of West Sixty-third Street, from Eleventh Avenue Northwest to Twentieth Avenue Northwest, all in The City of Seattle, by regrading, curbing, constructing concrete sidewalks and wooden crosswalks thereon, and providing for all necessary surface drainage; under Ordinance No. 21497, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
